TopicTitle: [1.1.2]Kerbal Stock Launcher Overhaul (6/6/16 More parts and improvements)

Articles.Content:
I didn't notice, I didn't like LR-87 that much. Of course when I start to have some time to develop again, I will have to finish this model, then in a release in the future, you can do whatever you want

I fixed the Tweakscale issues with the mod, I can PM you the configs I came up with if you like. Or if you don't have time for modding currently then I'm happy to hold on to them for now

I fixed the Tweakscale issues with the mod, I can PM you the configs I came up with if you like. Or if you don't have time for modding currently then I'm happy to hold on to them for now 

You could place the fix in a code block for people like myself that would implement it themselves if blackheart is too busy to post an official fix.

Oh well, it's just a thought

You could place the fix in a code block for people like myself that would implement it themselves if blackheart is too busy to post an official fix.

Oh well, it's just a thought

Like this?


MODULE
{
    name = TweakScale
    type = stack
    freeScale = false
    scaleFactors = 1.25, 2.5, 3.75
    scaleNames = 1.25, 2.5, 3.75
    techRequired = generalRocketry, heavyRocketry, heavierRocketry
    defaultScale = 2.5
}

EDIT: It worked! Thanks for the suggestion, I didn't know how to do that.

Like this?

{Snip}

EDIT: It worked! Thanks for the suggestion, I didn't know how to do that.

Thank you very much!

Thank you for fixing it and yes, it's not a hobby to update a pack for a single hotfix due to my slow internet but I accept configs and you can post them here. On the other hand I still got some things to do irl.

KE-180

Still have mediocre development, very hot place I live in at this point of the year. Here's the imported model. Switchable cover if you want that Atlas look. I'm planning to make it resizable to make it looks more accurate. Planned stats are two LV-T30 in one engine.

Here's how it looks on the existing tank:
O MAN that looks Great
That looks amazing!
Any update hope this is still on the radar ?
I changed the texture a little bit, yes I am working on it. I'll be honest though, I'm waiting for GTA V. I can pre-load it on steam already.

KE-180

http://i.imgur.com/IK9dk7O.gif

Still have mediocre development, very hot place I live in at this point of the year. Here's the imported model. Switchable cover if you want that Atlas look. I'm planning to make it resizable to make it looks more accurate. Planned stats are two LV-T30 in one engine.

Here's how it looks on the existing tank:

Looks like with that engine you could make the new

Looks like with that engine you could make the new http://www.ulalaunch.com/uploads/images/Vulcan_441_Side413201562153PM63.pnghttp://www.ulalaunch.com/uploads/images/Vulcan_561_Side413201573325PM63.png

Apparently the Vulcan uses the BE-4 engine, two of them which is present in this pack (KE-4) so it should be pretty close. Only problem is the design of the BE-4 seem to be different from the original picture from Blue Origin and also there is no engine cover if you want to make two engines clustered.
Great!can u redone the mk 1 command pod??

So... I see all of these amazing parts in the thread, and I see people playing with all of these parts, like the retrorockets (Seperatron 2?) And they all looks absolutely amazing, but when i download it and such, they're not there. Am I doing something wrong?

Great!can u redone the mk 1 command pod??

I don't think so, at least at this moment. Also, just in case you think this is a remake that overwrites stock parts, it isn't. Might I recommend you to Ven's stock part revamp? Or maybe Try checking out HGR command pods.

So... I see all of these amazing parts in the thread, and I see people playing with all of these parts, like the retrorockets (Seperatron 2?) And they all looks absolutely amazing, but when i download it and such, they're not there. Am I doing something wrong?

Not at all, the parts you like to see were from the 0.23.5 patch, I remade the parts and removed the old parts from the pack. If you want, you can download the previous pack and try if it works. But reminds me, maybe I should actually make a sepratron now. And sorry might I caused a misunderstanding.
Also would like to update that KE-180 was finished today, RT-A is also done. If I can find an upper stage for 1.25m size that will replace LV-909 and finish it, I will release the next pack version

Also would like to update that KE-180 was finished today, RT-A is also done. If I can find an upper stage for 1.25m size that will replace LV-909 and finish it, I will release the next pack version
